ai-atk-s0303a12:2_1: It is the first absorption concentration in the first absorption. This is the second absorption.
ai-atk-s0303a12:2_2: Having entered immersion, he doesn’t enter upon a meditation subject while placing the mind and keeping it connected. He doesn’t enter upon a meditation subject.
ai-atk-s0303a12:2_3: The same method of explanation applies to the word-meanings should be understood in this way.
ai-atk-s0303a12:3_0: Transmigration for concentration and for one who is moved.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_1: They’re not skilled in the second absorption in the three absorptions, skilled in remaining in meditation, or skilled in making absorption.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_2: He is not able to get up from his seat when he has emerged from stillness.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_3: When your mind isn’t skilled in immersion, he’s not skilled in gladdening the mind.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_4: He is not skilled in the objects of concentration, skilled in the sense spheres,
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_5: He is not skilled in the profitable immersion but alms in alms-resort: the work of alms-resort.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_6: immersion is not skilled in projecting the mind.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_7: One is not able to practice carefully, wield out what is possible.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_8: One who doesn’t act in line with the teachings, in line with the teachings, or one who practices it.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_9: immersion is not able to fulfill the happiness of immersion.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_10: Then, when he has entered upon another attainment, he who is more than that,
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_11: the meaning should be understood in the way already described.
ai-atk-s0303a12:4_12: But in the case of the jhāna is connected with it, although it is subtle by means of the jhāna.
ai-atk-s0303a12:5_0: The Linked Discourses on Absorption is finished.
ai-atk-s0303a12:6_0: This is the talk about the shells in the heavens,
ai-atk-s0303a12:8_0: The second conversation amongst those who were unfinished.
